org.spf4j.concurrent.jdbc

Interface Semaphore

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JdbcSemaphore, ProcessLimitedJdbcSemaphore

    @ParametersAreNonnullByDefault
public interface Semaphore
    A interface that abstracts a semaphore.
    Author:
    zoly

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • acquire

        void acquire(long timeout,
             TimeUnit unit)
      throws InterruptedException,
             TimeoutException
        Acquire one permit.
        Parameters:
        timeout - time to wait for permit to become available.
        unit - units of time.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - - operation interrupted.
        TimeoutException - - timed out.

      • acquire

        void acquire(int nrPermits,
             long timeout,
             TimeUnit unit)
      throws InterruptedException,
             TimeoutException
        Acquire a arbitrary number of permits.
        Parameters:
        nrPermits - - numer of permits to acquire.
        timeout - - time to wait for permit to become available.
        unit - - units of time.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - - operation interrupted.
        TimeoutException - - timed out.

      • tryAcquire

        @CheckReturnValue
boolean tryAcquire(long timeout,
                                     TimeUnit unit)
                              throws InterruptedException
        try to acquire a permit.
        Parameters:
        timeout - time to wait for permit to become available.
        unit - units of time.
        Returns:
        true if permit acquired, false if timed out.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - - operation interrupted.

      • tryAcquire

        @CheckReturnValue
boolean tryAcquire(int nrPermits,
                                     long timeout,
                                     TimeUnit unit)
                              throws InterruptedException
        try to acquire a number of permits.
        Parameters:
        nrPermits - number of permits to acquire.
        timeout - time to wait for permits to become available.
        unit - units of time.
        Returns:
        true if permits acquired, false if timed out.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - - operation interrupted.

      • release

        void release()
        release 1 permit.

      • release

        release a number of permits.
        Parameters:
        nrPermits - the number of permits to release.
